member.name: F:IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.FlowStyle.Inline
member.summary: A collection is formatted to a single line.

member.name: F:IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.FlowStyle.Block
member.summary: Each item of the collection is emitted on a new line.

member.name: M:IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.YamlObjectOps.ToYamlProperties(IronRuby.Runtime.RubyContext,System.Object)
member.summary: Returns an array of sorted instance variable names.

member.name: M:IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.YamlMutableStringOps.ContainsBinaryData(IronRuby.Builtins.MutableString)
member.summary: Returns true if the string binary representation contains bytes from set: 0..0x1f + 0x7f..0xff - [0x0a, 0x0d].

True if the string representation is multi-line, i.e. if - the string contains \n followed by data, - any YAML properties has been attached to the string (to_yaml_properties returns non-null), - to_yaml_style returns true value (???)

member.name: T:IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.NodeProvider
member.summary: Provides YAML nodes for Ruby object constructor.

member.name: T:IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.SimpleNodeProvider
member.summary: Simple NodeProvider implementation. Provides only one given node.

member.name: M:IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.BaseConstructor.ConstructScalar(IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.Node)
member.summary: Returns the value of the scalar.

member.name: M:IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.Emitter.DetermineChomp(System.String)
member.summary: Chomping controls how final line breaks and trailing empty lines are interpreted. 1) Clip ("") The final line break is preserved in the scalar’s content. Any trailing empty lines are excluded from the scalar’s content. 2) Strip ("-") The final line break and any trailing empty lines are excluded from the scalar’s content. 3) Keep ("+") The final line break and any trailing empty lines are considered to be part of the scalar’s content. These additional lines are not subject to folding.

member.name: P:IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.CollectionStartEvent.Tag
member.summary: A tag or null if the implicit tag should be used.

member.name: P:IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.CollectionStartEvent.FlowStyle
member.summary: False if formatted as a block (each item on its own line).

member.name: T:IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.LiteralParser
member.summary: This must be hooked to allow big integer parsing

member.name: F:IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.LiteralParser.ParseInteger
member.summary: Parses an integer/biginteger given sign, base, and digit string. The sign, base prefix, and numeric seperator characters are already stripped off

member.name: M:IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.RubyRepresenter.ToYamlProperties(System.Object)
member.summary: Dynamically calls to_yaml_properties on a given object. The method should return a list of instance variable names (Symbols or Strings) of the object that should be serialized into the output stream.

member.name: T:IronRuby.StandardLibrary.Yaml.RubyYaml.YamlStream
member.summary: YAML documents collection. Allows to collect and emit YAML documents.
